entry.title: About development
entry.summary: "Top notch development teams don't torture their programmers. Even minor frustrations caused by using underpowered tools add up, making programmers grumpy and unhappy. And a grumpy programmer is an unproductive programmer." - Joel Spolsky, from the "Joel Test".
